artefact: Check the MOT status of a vehicle

artefact.overview: Find out the MOT test status of a vehicle - check the date of the test, the odometer reading (mileage) and the expiry date of a test pass
artefact.more_information:
You'll need the vehicle registration mark and either:

- the MOT test number (you can get this from the VT20 test certificate or the VT30 refusal certificate)
- the document reference number from the V5C registration certificate (logbook) if you don't have the MOT test number

##Check if a MOT certificate is genuine

Check if your MOT certificate is genuine by comparing its details against what's recorded online.
artefact.introduction: Enter vehicle details online to see the date of the last MOT test, the mileage at the time of the MOT test and the expiry date of the MOT test.

details.description: Includes getting an MOT, MOT fees and vehicle insurance

Book your driving test or get a tax disc online, find out the legal requirements for buying, owning, importing or scrapping a car or motorcycle, and read about your rights and responsibilities as a driver.

artefact.title: Check the MOT history of a vehicle
